annotations.description: This year we decided to ditch the green beer and ditch the Leperchaun outfit and celebrate St. Patrick's Day with real Irish heritage and real Irish Whiskey!...
annotations.title: Celebrating St. Patrick’s Day With Bushmills and Three Cocktails!

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Irish Whiskey
.5oz (15ml) Sweet Vermouth
.5oz (15ml) Coffee Liqueur
2-3 Dahses Angostura Bitters

Stir and strain into coup

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UhG8cvXVEFs
title: Black Shamrock
